website_summaries.verdict: Secure way to carry 100-plus balls at a time. Terrific method of transferring balls with you anywhere.
pros: Will snap into a travel cart for easy dispensing of balls
Bag and strap are a comfortable way to carry balls with you
Extremely durable handles will stand up to regular use
Works for carrying balls to a tennis machine
cons: Large capacity only aimed at those who practice a lot
No means of picking up balls without bending over

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH THE FRAME - Product as is, is not a hopper, it is just a bag.
customer_reviews.text: The listing is misleading. The title is called EZ Travel Cart Pro Ball Hopper but it should really say "EZ tennis travel cart bag" as it does later in the fine print. The Title needs to be changed to include the word bag, or replacement bag or "Does not include Hopper Frame". Bag Quality is okay ... although without the frame, it is no different than a zippered reusable grocery bag. Side wall material is very thin, base material is okay and includes a piece of square support to make it a bit more sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: get at least two
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and it makes group lessons so much easier. One is full of balls, the other one I keep empty. During group drills, I feed with the full hopper, while the empty one is in the back of the court. After a student hits, say 6 balls, I have them run to the other side and pick up 6 balls. When the hopper I'm feeding from is empty, I just roll it to the back of the court and take the full one. Saves a ton of time.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for this size
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller travel cart lasted me 6 years of teaching. Larger size: the bag ripped after third week and legs broke after 7 weeks. Can’t figure out how to return or ask for return but this item is just not strong enough for its needed use.
customer_reviews.author: sean dullaghan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pickleball practice!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to take out of car, use and put away afterwards. Wheels roll easily for court use. Cart will hold enough balls to fill a high capacity ball machine. Perfect for lessons and drills. The zippered top keeps balls inside for travel. I love this one!
customer_reviews.author: JayMK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to feed balls to my (now) 10 yr old daughter. Been using it for over two years now and I have to say it is an indefensible part of our training! A must have for us...
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Breaks easily, I bought one again today for $200 because I need them for coaching so much. They wheel great and comfortable, however sturdy is huge issue. If you can spend $200 every 6 months get it. I can afford it so I give in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It could be stronger but i loved the warranty!
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty light, which is a good thing until I had a problem with the Cart when one of the aluminum legs broke. But the Company has a good warranty! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Franco Barrella

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing. I grew up using shopping carts for tennis ...
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. I grew up using shopping carts for tennis balls, but wanted something that could fold into the back of my SUV for my son who is just starting out. I was really tempted to buy the metal ones; however, I am very very pleased with this purchase. 1st, the legs/base/wheels shipped completely put together. I assumed I would have to assemble it and that was a wonderful surprise. It is light-weight and easy to move and folds nicely. I really do love this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C. Henley

customer_reviews.title: Very light and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is easy to remove the ball basket from the cart, allowing you collapse the cart. This allows you to fit strap to your motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh Duy Mai

customer_reviews.title: Ball Hopper replacement bag...
customer_reviews.text: Canvas material is not as sturdy as previous bag which had to be replaced after years of service... Only time will tell if this "thinner" bag holds up as well...
customer_reviews.author: jeff1334

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag now for about two months. It is sturdy and durable and easy to carry. It seems to perform exactly as intended and described.
customer_reviews.author: HAJ in NC

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and very easy to fold up and put in a car
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and very easy to fold up and put in a car. Nice looking. Our only criticism is that it is slightly top heavy so when you push it you can't be in a hurry or it might topple over.
customer_reviews.author: fruityblonde

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold, lite to carry and 5 Vball’s fit but wish it was a little bigger so the 6th vball would fit perfectly and won’t come out if the cart gets fit. I use it for vball tournaments better than the big and heavy carts fit volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Best way to carry balls from place to place. The wheels could be attached to the legs in a stronger way as they start to fall off after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoTeachSteph

customer_reviews.title: Every tennis instructor needs this!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase made my life as tennis instructor easier. No more balls rolling around in my truck. No more metal basket falling over on the court. Only thing I wish this design had was an outside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Y Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Best ball basket ever
customer_reviews.text: We've tried many other ball hoppers and this is by far the best. It's very light to carry, and rolls smoothly. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Seems on the four corners come apart fast.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this everytime because it’s the only one but the seems on the four corners always come apart. This is not built to last. But there’s nothing else that fits my travel cart.
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo A. Corpuz

customer_reviews.title: This is great on the go tennis ball hopper.
customer_reviews.text: This is great on the go tennis ball hopper. Super easy to asseble. Has a lock mechanism when it's windy which I use all the time. Easy to carry on off court.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took it on an airplane with us and had to check the metal cart but the bag (half full of balls) was okay to take as a carry on. We use it twice a day every day and it's holding up well now for over one month.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen G

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and store
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and store. The bag is somewhat flimsy so you have to careful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis ball carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis ball carrier. Now e don't have to lug the metal ball cart. The whells on this are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 4monkies

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backup 2nd basket for on court teaching. EZ to pop in and out of frame.
customer_reviews.author: Fedfan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for playing with your kids!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put in car and take with you. The canvas bag comes out of the stand. The stand folds together, but is still very long like a collapsable chair. Lightweight and easy to put up at the courts. Hold plenty of balls.
customer_reviews.author: TexasZooMom

customer_reviews.title: This has been great! Wheels seem to be holding up and holds ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! Wheels seem to be holding up and holds lots of balls.
customer_reviews.author: Mac007

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball bag for the price. I really like the buttons to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laz

customer_reviews.title: Gamma Ez Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is not as the description of being the cart bag. This is a separate bag and not the one that can replace the canvas on the wheeled cart. Works fine, but the description should be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to carry the tennis balls around with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to carry the tennis balls around with out them spilling out the back of my truck. This is going to be great when we go on vacation. Have the wheels to push around was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: DizneyFamily

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing tennis last year and this was a great purchase and so glad I did buy it. I also bought the Gamma Ballhopper Balltube where I can pick up the balls easier as well and love both of these picks! Bobbie in Raleigh
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a traveling tennis instructor in the summer months and this works PERFECTLY!! I'm considering getting a few more bags filled with different tennis balls but keeping the same stand. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Junior C.

customer_reviews.title: Cart is wonderful! Beats lugging around the really heavy and clumsy ...
customer_reviews.text: Cart is wonderful! Beats lugging around the really heavy and clumsy metal ball hoppers. This costs a lot more, but it/s worth the money and makes you feel like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality. Worked perfectly during outdoor pickleball play
customer_reviews.text: arrive quickly. Seems to be good quality. Worked perfectly during outdoor pickleball play.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ballentine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Strong, Saturday, and perfect for my daughters tennis balls. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Windstorm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing training tool.
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits into the car compartment. Great job on court.
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR ARTIENDA

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My last one lasted almost 10 years before breaking. I had to change the bags and wheels though, but the frame was solid. I hope this one lasts that long
customer_reviews.author: Lille Krukrubo

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable cart. It is lightweight, comes with a carrying bag for the stand, making for an easy way to tote this cart around. I also like the fact I can buy multiple bags for different kinds of balls. I have my "Stay and Play" balls in one bag and my traditional yellow balls in another. The stand is a bit wobbly as one other reviewer mentioned, but when you are feeding balls, the cart stays in one place anyway. Works great and would recommend to anyone that travels or doesn't have their own court.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Shenanigans

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement. The material is a little thin
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement. The material is a little thin, but works. Great to give extras that you can load up for different balls for different courts situations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very week, just after two uses it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for avid tennis players
customer_reviews.text: Handy item for serious tennis players. Sturdy bag, well made. Gave as Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: jammac

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I started to take a tennis lesson. I like it very much. So easy to use and light. I use it every time I go to play tennis outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi2525

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, easy to use. Very practical. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They finally got it right
customer_reviews.text: The newly designed snaps are far better than the previous design
customer_reviews.author: Robert Falk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who is Tennis Pro in Boca Raton . He Asked for it as 27 th bday gift . He Loves it 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Rozy288

customer_reviews.title: Got a great deal for this unit when the prices dropped and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to have when shoulder muscles ache from carrying a fully loaded metal hopper. Got a great deal for this unit when the prices dropped and I even used my amzn points to get the price even lower. Turned into an awsome deal.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL C CABIGON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This ballhopper is easy to assemble, lightweight, holds a lot of balls. I like this hopper much better than any of the metal kind which are bulky, hard to handle and difficult to store. Love it - highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: This is great to fold up and cary places
customer_reviews.text: Tennis coach loves this. This is great to fold up and cary places. Perfect for games and practices.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching professionals who travel to different locations
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, durable and super easy to transport. I teach 6 days/week at various parks and this is really easy to pack up and move from place to place. Huge recommendation for the traveling teaching pro.
customer_reviews.author: MilkMan

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for a tennis ball Hopper exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great, easy travel bag for either the tennis professional or the avid tennis player.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Street Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Workout
customer_reviews.text: Holds tons of balls, you get a good workout hitting all the balls
customer_reviews.author: Gary A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to load and unload in a car. Wheels work great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Gamma Sports EZ Travel Cart.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to teach couple of classes per week and other instructors used it for theirs Few Rivets came off and could not fix them or replace the with screws. Maybe was not meant for every day use. I'll buy the more expensive one that may be more suitable for every day use.Gamma customer service was not friendly for replacement, but Amazon staff is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcimer pickup

customer_reviews.title: Legs
customer_reviews.text: If the lower section of the legs could telescope to a shorter length, this would make it fit into car trunk easier.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Anton

customer_reviews.title: Glad we broke down and got this
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these used by my son local tennis coach and others. Works great, rolls great, carries a lot of ball. Very glad we purchased. Can feed a lot more ball than the typical ball hopper. Easy to collapse, carry and store. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI L ROUTZAHN

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold, unfold. Perfect for carrying. Save space and time.
customer_reviews.author: Huang

customer_reviews.title: Glad I decided on this one
customer_reviews.text: Glad I decided on this one. I needed something very portable and it works great for doing hand toss drills with my junior. I was worried at first about its sturdiness but so far no problems. I usually only roll it around on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! It is super easy to set up and the storage bag for the balls is awesome... Zip close so no tennis ball spills! Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Arnke01

customer_reviews.title: Great hopper
customer_reviews.text: Great hopper! Expensive but worth it. Cart is well designed, llght and easily stored, and easy to put together. Very easy to navigate on the court. If you can accept the price, it's awesome to use.
customer_reviews.author: TennisDad-SF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in carry case
customer_reviews.text: Cart rolls very smoothly when on pavement to & from car. Easy to put in carry case. Good buy, but a little overpriced I think.
customer_reviews.author: Big Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Works well but avoid letting students push it to fast forward. capacity is good put I use two for 300 balls.
customer_reviews.author: DonnyBoy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It's very portable, easy to use and easy to set up. I haven't used it all that long but I don't foresee any wheel issues. It's definitely not sturdy enough for a tennis pro to use 8 hours a day, but I don't think that's why you buy this. A tennis pro should be using a sturdy metal ball hopper. I use it to drill my kids every now and then and it is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: John Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is available for a couch and a player in a tennis court. It is light for weight and convenient for hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Lian

customer_reviews.title: it's great
customer_reviews.text: the hopper is really great. easy to handle and very smooth on the court. the wheels are smooth and the bag is easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Ppcikid

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and I have one set of legs and I use them interchangeably. So, only purchase 1 set of legs!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Knack

customer_reviews.title: Gamma Ballhopper Ez Travel Cart Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description, excellent built quality and fits my current cart. Highly recommended for anyone who wish to purchase extra bags for their cart. Especially useful when coaching different levels, use each bag for red, green and normal balls.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Lai

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Fits a a lot if balls and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag ! Fits a a lot if balls and works well for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and I love the quantity of balls that it holds and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and I love the quantity of balls that it holds and the ability to transport the cart easily to our away matches. I coach high school tennis and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Poulton

customer_reviews.title: Gamma Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous bag for the price!!! It holds well over 100 balls & is very easy to carry. Excellent product!!! Customer
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!  !  !
customer_reviews.text: Got it ahead of schedule, pkg in perfect condition and I'm enjoying teaching my daughter to play tennis with the help of this cart. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much and the wheels very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lose screws
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is great and nothing like it is available , the screws are very easy to get lose. Be aware of the lock wheels .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the court and perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Perfect for on the court and perfect for travel. Outstand product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Smith

customer_reviews.title: Practical Teaching Tool
customer_reviews.text: For portability and a professional image, the gamma Ball Hopper fits the requirements. Well made, easy to take apart and put back together, sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Great ball hopper!!
customer_reviews.text: This hopper works extremely well and is so portable! The product wasn't listed as new, but seemed to be due to the great shape it was in!
customer_reviews.author: allegro80

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in timely fashion. Easy to set up and use. Casters work smoothly. So far has met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Slenkamp

customer_reviews.title: It's the way to go
customer_reviews.text: The purchase went great; no problems whatsoever. Couldn't ask for a better experience! I'd do it again; you'll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Dslayer

customer_reviews.title: Great tenis call bag for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tennis ball travel bag! The zipper doesn't feel that strong but I have taken it on the road with my team and it is really easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Pires De Almeida

customer_reviews.title: very fast service love the product
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. Very simple and easy to use. It is light weight and very portable. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Noel C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and easy to carry More than 100 balls can fit in this bag. I use for my tennis ball machine
customer_reviews.author: Hung X. Do DDS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need
customer_reviews.text: We have two kids that play a lot of tennis and found ourselves in need of a ball cart that could hold more balls than the current ones we have. This moving cart allows us to move from court to court without a problem. Very light weight & can easily throw in the back of your car. I highly reccomend this ball cart!!
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: Stand is good.... bag is ripping!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the EZ travel cart for their convenience and ease of use. The product arrived on time. The stand is good but the bag ripped within a month of gentle use. Have asked for a replacement. Hoping this is just a one off and my replacement is good!
customer_reviews.author: Coach

product_meta.title: Gamma Sports EZ Travel Cart Pro, Portable & Compact Design, Sturdy & Lightweight Construction, 150 or 250 Capacity Available, Premium Carrying Case Included
feature_bullets: MAXIMIZE YOUR TRAINING SESSION’S EFFICIENCY! - Make sure that your tennis training session is 100% efficient by choosing the Gamma Ballhopper premium EZ tennis travel cart bag!
PORTABLE & COMPACT! – This premium tennis travel cart bag is designed to provide enhanced portability! Plus, its compact dimensions and sturdy materials make it extremely easy to transfer and use!

IMPROVED SAFETY! – We have added new and improved, heavy duty metal snaps that secure the bag to the corners of your travel cart’s frame! You can rest assured that all 150 of your tennis balls are safe and secure!

EASY CARRYING! – Due to its lightweight material and the two convenient handles, you will be able to easily carry this tennis travel cart bag anywhere you need! Plus, its two mesh cover zips will keep the balls inside during transport!

SERVING FOR SUCCESS! – We, at Gamma, are the undisputed leaders when it comes to durable and handy tennis court equipment! One of the reasons is that we confidently back our tennis products with a full money back !
